about_the_game:
Storm the Court aims to deliver the definitive college basketball simcade experience!

Note: This game is still very early in development, expect a ton of improvements as the game gets further along. Check out my other games Sunday Rivals and Mini Hockey Champ! to see what a finished Storm the Court might look like!

Gameplay
Streamlined, easy to learn controls and mechanics
Full slider and difficulty controls, play the game however you want
Fun comes first, plays like basketball but cranked to 11
Immersive college basketball atmosphere, just like being in the student section!

Expected features at launch:
Full control of a college basketball program over multiple seasons
Take over an existing program or create your own schools and conferences
Scout and recruit top high school players from all over the nation
Develop player skills so today's freshman can lead the team senior year
Manage lineups, hot and cold streaks, and injuries
Full team and player customization with potential for modding (CSV rosters, etc)
Support for local multiplayer and coop, AI vs AI spectator modes

For the latest news on development be sure to join the 26k Discord and follow 26k on social media
